pullsbody:
I've done some work on this for #872676, following the discussions we had over bugzilla/irc.

Hopefully we can burninate the bug if you're OK with the changes, or at least we can start iterating (for example, replacing the 'fake' menu bar with x-menubar or the appropriate tag). I had a look at the Firefox OS style guide but I didn't copy the entire stylesheet in order to keep things simple and less overwhelming :-)

r? @fwenzel @jlongster

pulltitle: Added ordered list to clarify steps in readme
pullsbody:
The readme might be confusing for absolute beginners.

The first set of bullet points are two ways of getting the template. If you do one, you do not do the other.

The second set of bullet points are 2 steps to run the app. Do one then the other.

Folks unfamiliar with volo might think they have to run volo create after clone.

To clarify I just made the second set of bullets ordered.
pull_repo_desc: A blank template for Open Web Apps
pull_commit_message: Added ordered list to clarify steps in readme
